text: Hi, I am having a difficult time getting the image url's externally from a gallery module with js. I am trying to get the gallery image and add them as background image on a parent div and hide the images from the gallery. I tried to append them with js but because the gallery is loading after the dom is ready the src returns me undefined. Any suggestions?
could you post your related javascript?
What was the syntax to get Module information outside of the module scope within a coded template? I've been trying {{content.widgets.module_ID#######.variable}} but that hasn't worked at all

it depedens on the field type maybe you need to use ...moduleid.var.body.value
or .color instead value or if it's inside a flex column 
widget_containers.module.id etc.

I suggest to you look in the dev. info so you can check for your page exactly:
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/how-to-use-developer-info-on-cos-pages>
Thanks for the tip - haven't ever used developer info surprisingly... quite useful
